# scrapex v1.0.0-beta.2

Patch release focused on packaging fixes.

## Fixes

- Ensure `scrapex/embeddings` is emitted in the build and available via package exports.
- Restore `createTransformersEmbedding`, `EmbeddingProvider`, and `embed` imports from `scrapex/embeddings`.

## Installation

```bash
npm install scrapex@beta
```

## Notes

- Requires **Node.js 20+**.

---

**Full Changelog**: [v1.0.0-beta.1...v1.0.0-beta.2](https://github.com/developer-rakeshpaul/scrapex/compare/v1.0.0-beta.1...v1.0.0-beta.2)
